New review. I've given the game several chances, but my review will stay negative. if it wasn't the janky lag then it's the players who have no originality. every game 3 out of 4 perks are always the same. BBQ n chilli, ruin and no one escapes death. that just makes the game boring and predictable. 

besides that the new killer (pinhead) is completely unbalanced with those perks. already have chains bugging you every second then no worries it gets worse with ruin. bloody pathetic. no originality.

want to play a original killer who tries a variety of perks? those guys have already left DBD. now it's just unoriginal lemmings watching old youtube videos to get the "toxic" perk build. makes the game truly boring. new match=ruin, bbq n chilli and ruin. YAWN!

Two games in one. 

SURVIVOR(S)
If you are ready to be chased, stabbed, hacked down, picked up, and hung on a meathook.... this is the game for you. 
OR
If you enjoy min/max meta gaming for try hards and teabagging people while shining flashlights in their eyes at the exit gates and ruining the game for everyone else... this is the game for you.

KILLER(S)
If you are ready to chase, stab, hack down, pick up, and hang folx on a meathook.... this is the game for you. Especially if your main source of fun is just standing there at the meathook and watching them slowly die. Knowing the rest of them will probably do all the objectives but at least you get to watch them wiggle and squirm like.... wait WTH is wrong with you?!

Simple concepts, weird interactions. some toxic players who will ruin it for you 25-40% of the time. Lots to learn and if you want to spend all your money you can get access to the stuff everyone else brings and play the same game over and over and over and over again.

I still like it. But I was playing For Honor before this so I am used to some self abuse.

Anyone looking to buy this game... don't save yourself the time and effort of 4 year old game the still feels like it's in beta.

The grind is fine, the concept is fun and enjoyable. The community and people playing though... I've played 8.1 hours so far, and so many toxic players (can't imagine people with hundreds or thousands of hours). People who throw, afk, you name it. Maybe, just maybe, if the reporting worked and the devs cared at all, it would be a lot better game. If you stand AFK, instant sacrifice and 5 hour penalty to join next game. You don't do anything all game, or even a portion, instant sacrifice and 5 hour penalty. 3 strikes and you're banned. Disconnect because you couldn't tea bag hard enough and died anyway? Aw, well, 24 hour suspension from playing, 2 times and you're banned. I spent almost 15 mins trying to find people that did nothing all game but camp with 4 gens left. If you want to see your game die, keep it going. Because it will.

THIS GAME IS FRIGGIN AWESOME SAUCE!!!!! The GIrl avatars in this game are kinda cute doe ngl. The only bad thing about this game is that there isnt enough Rule 34 of it, Rip doe. Also, the online interactions between players are so memorable!!!! Once I gave a gamer girl my address, so we could go out on a date. And then my house was broken into, and my baby sister was kidnapped and filmed digging her own grave, before being tortured and mutilated. LOL, she was so annoying anyways. #siblingssuck

As a survivor, you'll enjoy lots of scary moments, brutal deaths where you get sacrificed to CTHULU and have a fun time outwitting killers. But, mostly, you gonna die! 

As a killer, the game is much less fun. Gaming community in all games has become toxic almost everywhere, and playing against crappy humans as killer is the low point of this game. Lots of humping and taunting and shit talk. As survivor you will only have to deal with low-life humans half the time - they steal stuff, lead the killer to you, etc. Generally, for a non-teamed player, you'll have fun getting scared for your full 20 dollars worth of game. Then, as you get better at it, you'll notice that American servers are full of god-awful Americans. 

This is no L4D coop experience. But, if you like getting scared silly and hiding and running and dying, it'll be worth the 20 or less on a steam sale. 

Killer can be fun - just don't even bother trying to kill the obnoxious ones. They are lifers who have nothing better to do than prove how great they are to themselves at the expense of fun and fairness. The usual gamer shit.

Наверное, единственная жизнеспособная и активно развивающаяся на данный момент (2020 год) игра с ассиметричным мультиплеером. Удивительно, что при небольшом разнообразии основных механик, игра умудряется почти всегда оставаться непредсказуемой и разнообразной.
В первую очередь за счёт многочисленных перков, билдов и множества разных маньяков со своими уникальными способностями.

Настоятельно рекомендую к ознакомлению.
10 починенных генов из 10.

Единственное, что может смазать ощущения - весьма токсичное комьюнити. 
Кемперы, тунеллеры, люди, творящие неадекват; тиммейты, ждущие у люка, когда тебя снимут с генератора и повесят; крысы, подставляющие товарищей - это ещё не полный список неприятных социальных феноменов в среди играющих.
Так что к таким штукам стоит быть готовым и не принимать близко к сердцу.
The game is very fun, there's a lot of balance issues and occasionally it spazzes out, but overall it is very good.
Easy to start but hard to master. Game is way more fun with a coordinated team of friends. takes around two hours to figure out how the game mechanics work.

Es macht KEINEN Spaß mehr das Spiel zu spielen. Es geht nicht, es geht einfach nicht, wenn ich mich mal dazu entscheide Killer zu spielen, dass als Killer Main, so habe ich IMMER das Problem mit dem Matchmaking und ja, ich KÖNNTE jede Lobby dogden wenn die Spieler zu gut sind aber meistens haben die Leute ihr Profil auf Privat oder es ist der typische swf Squad von der Ps4 wo man das Profil nicht ansehen kann. Ich bin Rank 8 und möchte auch Rank 8 Survivor und keine Rank 17er + 3x Rank 2er. Ich habe mich entschlossen das Spiel zu deinstallieren da ich keinen Spaß mehr habe und ich Survivor spielen einfach nicht mag. Wenn es passieren sollte, dass ein Update kommt der das gesamte Spiel fixt, so bin ich bereit Dbd eine neue Chance zu geben, vorher aber nicht.
Not enough holiday events :( but its a good passive game with a few challenging moments through the match.

So, almost everyone knows this game is hella infuriating. This is one of 2 games I will often rage quit on, especially in higher ranked matches.  Now, despite this, I still have a lot of fun with friends on this game. The engine its run on is trash, the game graphics are pretty shite, the mechanics break all the time. But, if this doesn't break your immersion and you can just laugh at it, id say buy it. If not, then i would consider a different game.
